    • Constructor Detail

      • WallFollowEnemy

        public WallFollowEnemy(boolean followRight,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       Map map,
                       Direction startingDirection)
                throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Creates a WallFollowEnemy that follows either the left or right wall for a map. Doesn't add itself to the map.
        Parameters:
        followRight - True if this should follow the right wall, false to follow the left wall.
        x - The x coordinate for this enemy on the map.
        y - The y coordinate for this enemy on the map.
        map - The map this enemy is for.
        startingDirection - The direction this enemy starts off facing.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - If the sprite is invalid
